participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and nurturing, enjoys engaging with children and sharing knowledge.
participant_1.background: i walk dogs for a living. i'm also a graduate student. i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Playful and curious, loves to make friends and share about her pet.
participant_2.background: i do not pick up my toys. i've a pet turtle. i'm four. my best friend lives next door.

content.text: I'm four and how old are you?
Are you my best friend? I know that my best friend lives next door, is that you?
I've a pet turtle. Do you have any pets?
